name: MTLVertexStepFunction
desc: The frequency with which the vertex function or post-tessellation vertex function fetches attribute data.

items.name: case constant
items.desc: The vertex function fetches attribute data once and uses that data for every vertex.

items.name: case perVertex
items.desc: The vertex function fetches and uses new attribute data for every vertex.

items.name: case perInstance
items.desc: The vertex function regularly fetches new attribute data for a number of instances that is determined by stepRate.

items.name: case perPatch
items.desc: The post-tessellation vertex function fetches data based on the patch index of the patch.

items.name: case perPatchControlPoint
items.desc: The post-tessellation vertex function fetches data based on the control-point indices associated with the patch.
